concept.title: What is subtraction of numbers?
concept.shortdesc: In this section, you will learn what subtraction is.

conbody.p: To perform the task of subtracting numbers, you need to know what subtraction is. "Subtraction" means taking something away from a group or number of things.
Subtraction represents a mathematical operation. It is a process that allows you to find the difference of two numbers.
You use the minus (-) button to express the subtraction operation in the app.
